The last version of [[Minecraft Infdev]] was released on '''June 30, 2010''', to fix bugs in the previous version of Infdev.<ref>[[wordofnotch:754041531|I fixed a few bugs in /game/, and the game is now playable offline]] – The Word of Notch, June 30, 2010</ref> This is the first of two versions released on this date.

== Changes ==
[[File:Painting JE1 BE1.png|frameless|width=32x32]] [[Painting|'''Paintings''']]
* Reverted back to being placeable directly adjacent to blocks.
== Fixes ==
'''3 bugs fixed'''
* The [[void]] now kills [[player]]s.
* [[Sign]]s work the way they used to.
* A few other minor bug fixes.{{More info needed|nocat=what exactly?|too vague - should be replaced with examples}}

Inf-20100630 spawner bug.png|Spawners in this version can show inside of them a second, motionless model of their configured mob. This motionless model is not removed when its spawner is broken.
